sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Menu, Segment, Image, Card, Icon } from 'semantic-ui-react' export default class MenuExampleSecondaryPointing extends Component { state = { activeItem: 'info' } handleItemClick = (e, { name }) => this.setState({ activeItem: name }) render() { const { activeItem } = this.state return (
{this.state.activeItem === 'relationships' ? "these are your relationships" : Matthew Joined in 2015 Matthew is a musician living in Nashville. 22 Friends }
) } }
